company_description: OneFootball partners with over 150 clubs, leagues, federations, players and brand partners to bring their content to the OneFootball network across 194 markets, and with a video distribution network that includes around 250 premium publishers partners globally. Founded in 2008, OneFootball is the leading football media platform for a new generation of mobile-first football fans. Serving many millions of fans every month OneFootball brings fans closer to the game with breaking news, highlight clips, live streaming and more.
